doc.after: Eastern Air Lines Shuttle (or Eastern Air Shuttle) was the brand name of Eastern's air shuttle. It began operations on April 30, 1961 and was sold in 1989 to Donald Trump, and later became the Trump Shuttle. In April 1992, the shuttle service began as the USAir Shuttle (now US Airways Shuttle). The shuttle originally flew between New York, Boston, Washington, D.C. and Newark. The shuttle's slogan was Imagine life without us
